summary: Bjarne runs a moving company together with his wife Malin, but it goes bad and they need to borrow money. Bjarnes father-in-law Halvar lives nearby. The two have never been in agreement which is based on a 20-year old conflict.
cast: Rolf Lassgård|Lia Boysen|Evelina Alexandersson|Andrea Wikman|Ingvar Hirdwall|Marika Lindström|Lena Strömdahl|Gisela Nilsson|Linus Oscarsson|Ingmar Virta|Ivan Mathias Petersson|Louise Ryme|Elisabet Carlsson|Tomas Laustiola|Michael Segerström|Göran Forsmark|Mikael Rahm|Sten Elfström|Patrik Johansson|Haine Haraldsson|Marianne Nilsson|Lasse Pettersson|Jimmy Lundgren|Mats Blomgren|Anders Öhrström|Christer Engberg|Ulf Svanström|Tomas Eriksson|Felix Engström|Douglas Johansson|Sofia Pekkari|Ida Hedlund-Stenmarck
director: Director: John Olsson (as John O. Olsson)
title: Miraklet i Viskan
